bug.summary: AssertionError: wrong output size (1D expected) when using PrecisionRecallF1ScoreCallback for Segmentation
bug.description:
Describe the bug PrecisionRecallF1ScoreCallback didn't work on a segmentation task. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Run a CNN with PrecisionRecallF1ScoreCallback with mask labels
Expected behavior PrecisionRecallF1ScoreCallback should work on segmentation tasks as well (not just on classification).
